title: Alik Bahshi
author: Alik Bahshi
content: Alik BahshiWho can answer a simple question?    I would be grateful if someone would give at least one example when Putin told the truth? Thank you.

comments.author: Bananington
comments.body: Quote from: Alik Bahshi on April 16, 2023, 08:03:33 PMAlik BahshiWho can answer a simple question?    I would be grateful if someone would give at least one example when Putin told the truth? Thank you.The point of this is to call him a liar. If you want to label Putin a liar, you are right, no arguments on my part, but also know that he is a politician and one similar attribute they all have is that they do not tell the plain truth. They can give half truth or twist the truth, but it is in very few cases that the plain truth is really spilled.

comments.author: yhiaali3
comments.body: Yes, you are right, but in return, give me an example of one president in the world who told the truth?  They are all liars.

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: Putin says all kinds of little truths to many people around him all the time. For example:- I'm hungry. Let's eat.- I'm thirsty. Could you get me a glass of [favorite beverage].- The car needs more gas for this trip.Thousands of words of truth all the time.

comments.author: Alik Bahshi
comments.body: Quote from: BADecker on April 16, 2023, 11:27:47 PMPutin says all kinds of little truths to many people around him all the time. For example:- I'm hungry. Let's eat.- I'm thirsty. Could you get me a glass of [favorite beverage].- The car needs more gas for this trip.Thousands of words of truth all the time.O.k. Provide a quote. I didn't hear everything you said. Give me a link.
